item.description:
It's Restaurant Week!
That special time of year when foodies get to enjoy the best of what Boston has to offer for a special price.
This year Restaurant Week is August 9-14, 16- 21.
For this meetup I picked Henrietta's Table. It has been getting great reviews from the globe, improper bostonian, yelpers, etc.

Henrietta's Table
Charles Hotel
1 Bennett Street
Cambridge
617-661-5005

Three-course Prix-fixe Dinner Menu: $33.09

The menu looks fantasic... for some reason I cant copy it but it is posted here. http://www.restaurant...

Please arrive on time as some places won't sit a party until the whole group gets there.

Nicole
item.name: Restaurant Week- Henrietta's Table
